member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandSiteLocation
member.summary: Where a command site will be deployed in Vault Explorer

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandSite
member.summary: A command site is your top-level menu which is displayed in Vault Explorer's "Tools" menu. Individual commands are pull-rights off of this menu.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandSite.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a CommandSite object with the provided identifier and label
member.param: A unique identifier for the site.
The display text.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandSite.AddCommand(Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem)
member.summary: Adds a command item to this command site
member.param: CommandItem to add to this CommandSite

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandSite.CommandItems
member.summary: Gets the commands contained in this command site.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandSite.Location
member.summary: Gets or sets the CommandSiteLocation associated with this command site.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandSite.DeployAsPulldownMenu
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean indicating whether this command site should appear as a pulldown menu when deployed to a toolbar.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandSite.Label
member.summary: Gets the extension-supplied label associated with this command site.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandSite.Id
member.summary: Gets the extension-supplied intifier associated with this command site.

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IDetailTabContext
member.summary: Used by DetailPaneTab selection event handlers to interact with the application

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IDetailTabContext.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes the vault explorer UI. The behavior is the same as if the user pressed the F5 key.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IDetailTabContext.Application
member.summary: Returns the application object for the current session.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IDetailTabContext.SelectedObject
member.summary: Returns the object that is currently selected. Returns null if no selection.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IDetailTabContext.UserControl
member.summary: Returns the visible instance of the extension-provided user control type.

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ICommandContext
member.summary: Information about the command currently executing

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ICommandContext.Application
member.summary: Gets interface to the application object

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ICommandContext.CurrentSelectionSet
member.summary: Gets the collection of objects that make up the current Vault Explorer selection set

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ICommandContext.ViewSelectionSet
member.summary: The items which are selected in the list view (top right pane)

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ICommandContext.NavSelectionSet
member.summary: The items which are selcted in the navigation view (treeview at the left)

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ICommandContext.PreviewSelectionSet
member.summary: The items which are selcted in the preview windows (bottom right pane)

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ICommandContext.ForceRefresh
member.summary: Should the UI be updated (F5-Refresh) when the command ends? By default, the UI is not updated as doing so could be time consuming.

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IExtension
member.summary: Interface between Vault Explorer and command extension assemblies.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IExtension.CommandSites
member.summary: Extension should create and return a list of CommandSite(s) imlpemented in the extension.
member.returns: Collection of CommandSite objects to make available in Vault Explorer

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IExtension.DetailTabs
member.summary: Extension should create and return a list of DetailPaneTab(s) to be display custom tabs when vault objects are selected.
member.returns: Collection of DetailPaneTab objects describing tabs implemented by the command extension

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IExtension.HiddenCommands
member.summary: Extension should create and return a list of ids of commands to be hidden from the user. Command ids should be from the list returned by: IApplication.CommandIds
member.returns: A list of ids of commands to be hidden from the user.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IExtension.ResourceCollectionName
member.summary: Return the resource collection name that contains image resources referenced in the CommandSites.
member.returns: Name of command extension resource collection

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IExtension.OnStartup(Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication)
member.summary: OnStartup() is called just before the user is given control for the first time. The "application" parameter can be used to add commands to the host application.
member.param: Information about the running application.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IExtension.OnShutdown(Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication)
member.summary: OnShutdown() is called as the application begins to shutdown; shortly after the user selects "File/Exit".
member.param: Information about the running application.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IExtension.OnLogOn(Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication)
member.summary: This function is called when the user logs on and their security context is created.
member.param: Information about the running application.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IExtension.OnLogOff(Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication)
member.summary: This function is called when the user logs off and their security context is cleared.
member.param: Information about the running application.

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.VaultContext
member.summary: Contains the security information needed to communicate with the Vault server.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.VaultContext.#ctor(System.String,System.Int64,System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: Constructs SecurityContext object. Most command extensions will not create their own SecurityContext object, but rather get it from the property IApplication.SecurityContext
member.param: The name of the Vault
Vault user id
Authentication ticket
Uri of ADMS currently logged in to

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.VaultContext.AdjustUrl(System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapHttpClientProtocol)
member.summary: Adjusts the service Uri to use RemoteBaseUrl
member.param: Service Uri to be adjusted to point at RemoteBaseUrl

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.VaultContext.VaultName
member.summary: Gets vault name

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.VaultContext.UserId
member.summary: Gets vault user id

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.VaultContext.Ticket
member.summary: Gets authentication ticket which can be used to make calls into the Web Services API of ADMS

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.VaultContext.RemoteBaseUrl
member.summary: Gets base url of the server. This is useful inconstructing URLs to the Web Services API of ADMS
member.returns: Uri of ADMS currently logged in to

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication
member.summary: This is the single top-level object which is passed to your Extension during events

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication.RefreshSecurityContext
member.summary: Re-issues a security context. Call this in the event of an expired license to acquire a new one.

member.summary: Gets the application icon.
member.returns: Pointer to the Vault application icon

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication.VaultContext

member.summary: Gets the name of the host application

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication.Title

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication.Version
member.summary: Gets the version of the host application

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.IApplication.Icon

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem
member.summary: A CommandItem is the pull-right menu entry; CommandItems must be added to a CommandSite.

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a command item.
member.param: Command-extension-supplied identifier. This id should be unique
Label presented to Vault Explorer users to identify the command

member.name: M:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.RaiseExecute(Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ICommandContext)
member.summary: Do not document

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.Label
member.summary: Gets the text displayed in the menu

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.Id
member.summary: Gets the Guid for this CommandItem; each Guid must be unique

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.ToolbarPaintStyle
member.summary: Gets/Sets the PaintStyle for this CommandItem when deployed on a toolbar.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.Hint
member.summary: Text representing the tooltip contents for the command item

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.Description
member.summary: The descriptive text that displays for this command in a Customize dialog. It gives more detail about what the command does.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.IconResourceName
member.summary: The resource name of the PNG or bitmap to be used as the icon for this command. For best results, provide the name of a 16x16 bitmap resource object.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.NavigationTypes
member.summary: Specifies the object types for which this command is available. If not specified, this command is always available.

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.MultiSelectEnabled
member.summary: If true (the default), this command is enabled when multiple items are selected (subject to filtering by NavigationType). If false, this command is enabled only when a single item is selected.

member.name: E:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.CommandItem.Execute
member.summary: The Execute event is fired when this command is activated; usually a result of the selecting this menu item.

member.name: T:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ApiVersionAttribute
member.summary: Define the [assembly: ApiVersion] attribute which MUST be specified for your command extension to be loaded. The current version is "2.0".

member.summary: Create an ApiVersionAttribute from a version string
member.param: Version of the api the command extension is written for

member.summary: Gets version string

member.summary: Representation of a selected object in the Vault Explorer. Label and Id properties can be used to

member.name: P:Autodesk.Connectivity.Explorer.Extensibility.ISelection.Id
